name: chuanshi.github.io
body:
# A Brief Description of My Projects

### [sgre](https://github.com/chuanshi/sgre)
I'm a contributor to the open-source clone for an Korean online collectible card game.  The primary server that hosts this game can be found at [swordgirls.net](http://swordgirls.net/)

### [slacklatex](https://github.com/chuanshi/slacklatex)
A [Slack](https://slack.com/) slash command to generate and upload an image of a LaTeX formula into your chats.

### [ase-espresso](https://github.com/chuanshi/ase-espresso)
[SUNCAT](http://suncat.stanford.edu/)'s [ASE](https://wiki.fysik.dtu.dk/ase/) Python interface for the [Quantum Espresso](http://www.quantum-espresso.org/) DFT code.

### [catmap](https://github.com/chuanshi/catmap)
I'm a co-author and contributor to [SUNCAT](http://suncat.stanford.edu/)'s CatMAP package for automated creation of microkinetic models useful for catalysis.  I primarily maintain the aspects of CatMAP relevant to electrochemical reactions.

### [salty_elo](https://github.com/chuanshi/salty_elo)
An old parser and tracker for [SaltyBet](http://www.saltybet.com/) that used OCR to maintain a database of fighter match history and ELO strength.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
